bike.description: Blend of high and mid modulus carbon fiber, Dyad Elite M30/T700 lay-up, tri-oval shaped top and down tubes with SST tubing diameters and internal cables, 1 1/8-1 1/2" head tube, PressFit 30 BB shell, asymmetrical chainstays, twin SST seat stays with carrier/fender eyelets, forged one-piece dropouts with replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Jamis full carbon composite fork, 1.5" hollow formed crown, monocoque one-piece forming technology, alloy dropouts with one eyelet
Shimano RS30 wheelset, 16/20H, 30mm rim profile, RS30 forged aluminum loose ball hubs and double butted bladed stainless steel spokes
Shimano Ultegra RD-6700 rear and Ultegra FD-6700 braze-on front with 34.9mm alloy clamp
Shimano Ultegra ST- 6700 Dual Control STI, 20-Speed
Ritchey Comp Logic Curve, 6061 aluminum, 31.8 x 400mm (48/51), 420mm (54/56), 440mm (58/61)
Ritchey Comp 4-Axis, 3D net forged 6061 alloy, 6JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (48/51), 100mm (54/56), 120mm (58/61)
Ritchey Pro Carbon, 31.6 x 350mm with Jamis 7075-AL CNC aluminum 1-bolt seat post clamp
Selle San Marco Ponza Power Arrowhead with Microfil cover and hollow chromoly-moly rails
FSA PressFit 30 with Wheels MFG adaptors
Shimano BR451 Super SLR long reach dual pivot calipers with cartridge pads and with Shimano Ultegra ST-6700 STI brake levers
